TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Activator extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._Activator

summary.span: 包含本機或遠端建立物件類型的方法，或者取得對現有遠端物件的參考。

span.span: Contains methods to create types of objects locally or remotely, or obtain references to existing remote objects.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法建立的組件中定義叫用建構函式最符合的型別執行個體指定的引數。The method creates an instance of a type defined in an assembly by invoking the constructor that best matches the specified arguments. 如果未不指定任何參數，不接受任何參數，也就是預設建構函式的建構函式會叫用。If no arguments are specified, the constructor that takes no parameters, that is, the default constructor, is invoked. 您必須擁有足夠的權限，以搜尋與呼叫建構函式否則，會擲回例外狀況。You must have sufficient permission to search for and call a constructor; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 根據預設，只有公用的建構函式會被視為建構函式搜尋期間。By default, only public constructors are considered during the search for a constructor. 如果可以找到任何建構函式或預設建構函式，則會擲回例外狀況。If no constructor or default constructor can be found, an exception is thrown. 繫結器參數會指定適當的建構函式組件中搜尋的物件。A binder parameter specifies an object that searches an assembly for a suitable constructor. 您可以指定您自己的繫結器和搜尋準則。You can specify your own binder and search criteria. 如果未不指定任何繫結器，則會使用預設繫結器。If no binder is specified, a default binder is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 類別。For more information, see the and classes. 辨識項參數會影響安全性原則和建構函式的權限。An evidence parameter affects the security policy and permissions for the constructor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 在本機或遠端站台，可以建立型別的執行個體。An instance of a type can be created at a local or remote site. 如果從遠端建立型別，則啟用屬性參數會指定遠端站台的 URI。If the type is created remotely, an activation attribute parameter specifies the URI of the remote site. 到達遠端站台之前，建立執行個體的呼叫可能會通過中間的站台。The call to create the instance might pass through intermediary sites before it reaches the remote site. 其他啟動屬性可以修改的環境中或在其中呼叫則是在遠端和中間的站台運作的內容。Other activation attributes can modify the environment, or context, in which the call operates at the remote and intermediary sites. 如果在本機建立的執行個體，則會傳回該物件的參考。If the instance is created locally, a reference to that object is returned. 如果從遠端建立執行個體，則會傳回 proxy 的參考。If the instance is created remotely, a reference to a proxy is returned. 遠端物件是透過 proxy 操作，如同它是本機物件。The remote object is manipulated through the proxy as if it were a local object. 方法會建立目前執行的遠端物件、 伺服器啟動已知物件或 XML Web service 的 proxy。The method creates a proxy to a currently running remote object, server-activated well-known object, or XML Web service. 您可以指定連接媒體，也就是通道。You can specify the connection medium, that is, the channel. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 組件包含型別定義。Assemblies contain type definitions. 方法會從目前正在執行的組件來建立型別的執行個體。The method creates an instance of a type from a currently running assembly. 方法從檔案包含的組件中建立執行個體。The method creates an instance from a file that contains an assembly. 方法從檔案包含的組件建立 COM 物件的執行個體。The method creates an instance of a COM object from a file that contains an assembly. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以動態方式建構物件，在執行階段類別。The following example shows how to use the class to dynamically construct objects at run time. [!code-cpp[ActivatorX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ActivatorX/cpp/ActivatorX.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ActivatorX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ActivatorX/cs/ActivatorX.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ActivatorX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ActivatorX/VB/ActivatorX.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要未包裝的傳回值的方法。Use the method to unwrap the return value. A屬性的值`true`必須為 COM 型別套用明確或預設所以方法可建立該類型的執行個體，否則就會擲回。A attribute with a value of `true` must be applied either explicitly or by default to the COM type so the method can create an instance of that type; otherwise, is thrown. 如需其他可能會叫用方法所擲回的例外狀況資訊，請參閱例外狀況區段和方法。For information about other exceptions that can be thrown by invoked methods, see the Exceptions section of the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來建立非公用型別，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，以及包含非公用類型的組件的授權集是否限制為呼叫者的授與設定或其子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to create nonpublic types if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types is restricted to the caller’s grant set or to a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要未包裝的傳回值的方法。Use the method to unwrap the return value. 啟用內容可在資訊清單架構啟動過程中，若要設定網域原則，並提供應用程式為基礎的安全性模型。The activation context is used during manifest-based activation to set up the domain policy and to provide an application-based security model. 類別包含提供存取權的應用程式資訊清單的物件。The class contains an object that provides access to the application manifest. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要叫用建構函式必須是可存取。The constructor to be invoked must be accessible. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用型別，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，以及包含非公用類型的組件的授權集是否限制為呼叫者的授與設定或其子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access nonpublic types if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types is restricted to the caller’s grant set or to a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method. 會建立許多不同類型的執行個體，並顯示其預設值。Instances of several different types are created and their default values are displayed. static member CreateInstance : string * string -> System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 組件的名稱，該組件包含要在其中搜尋名稱為 typeName 的類型。

param.span: 如果 assemblyName 為 ，則會搜尋執行中的組件。

summary.span: 使用具名組件和預設建構函式，建立已具有指定名稱之類型的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the type whose name is specified, using the named assembly and default constructor.

returns.span: 必須解除包裝的控制代碼，用來存取新建立的執行個體。

span.span: A handle that must be unwrapped to access the newly created instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要未包裝的傳回值。Use to unwrap the return value. `assemblyName` 可以是下列其中一項：`assemblyName` can be either of the following: - 組件，而它的路徑或檔案的副檔名不簡單名稱。The simple name of an assembly, without its path or file extension. 例如，您會指定`TypeExtensions`其路徑和名稱是.\bin\TypeExtensions.dll 組件。For example, you would specify `TypeExtensions` for an assembly whose path and name are .\bin\TypeExtensions.dll. - 帶正負號的組件，其中包含其簡單名稱、 版本、 文化特性和公開金鑰語彙基元; 的完整名稱例如，"TypeExtensions，version=1.0.0.0，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = 181869f2f7435b51"。The full name of a signed assembly, which consists of its simple name, version, culture, and public key token; for example, "TypeExtensions, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=181869f2f7435b51". 如需有關 common language runtime 如何識別及載入組件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 執行階段如何找出組件](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)。For more information on how the common language runtime identifies and loads assemblies, see [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md). 如需使用應用程式組態檔來定義組件位置的資訊，請參閱[指定組件的位置](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/specify-assembly-location.md)。For information on using the application configuration file to define assembly locations, see [Specifying an Assembly's Location](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/specify-assembly-location.md). 如果`assemblyName`找到，它會載入預設內容中。If `assemblyName` is found, it is loaded in the default context. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來建立非公用型別，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，以及包含非公用類型的組件的授權集是否限制為呼叫者的授與設定或其子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to create nonpublic types if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types is restricted to the caller’s grant set or to a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為類別`Person`名為組件中`PersonInfo`。The following example defines a class named `Person` in an assembly named `PersonInfo`. 請注意，`Person`類別有兩個建構函式，其中之一就是無參數。Note that the `Person` class has two constructors, one of which is parameterless. [!code-csharp[System.Activator.CreateInstance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/cs/personinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Activator.CreateInstance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/vb/personinfo.vb#1)] 下列範例會呼叫方法具現化`Person`類別。The following example calls the method to instantiate the `Person` class. 它需要 PersonInfo.dll 可以加入至專案的參考。It requires a reference to PersonInfo.dll to be added to the project. 因為方法呼叫`Person`類別預設建構函式，此範例將值指派給其`Name`屬性。Because the method calls the `Person` class default constructor, the example assigns a value to its `Name` property. [!code-csharp[System.Activator.CreateInstance#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/cs/createinstanceex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Activator.CreateInstance#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/vb/createinstanceex1.vb#2)] 不過，常被稱為型別，在跨電腦界限或在設計階段不知道，具現化。However, is frequently called to instantiate a type that crosses machine boundaries or that is not known at design time. 在此情況下，您不能包含在專案中的組件的參考，並不能進行型別之成員的早期繫結呼叫。In this case, you cannot include a reference to the assembly in the project and cannot make early-bound calls to the type's members. 若要解決這項限制，下列範例會使用方法，以及將值指派給反映`Person`物件的`Name`屬性，並顯示其值。To work around this limitation, the following example uses the method along with reflection to assign a value to the `Person` object's `Name` property and to display its value. [!code-csharp[System.Activator.CreateInstance#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/cs/createinstanceex1a.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Activator.CreateInstance#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/vb/createinstanceex1a.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要叫用建構函式必須是可存取，而且必須提供指定的引數清單最特定的相符項目。The constructor to be invoked must be accessible and must provide the most specific match with the specified argument list. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用型別，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，以及包含非公用類型的組件的授權集是否限制為呼叫者的授與設定或其子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access nonpublic types if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types is restricted to the caller’s grant set or to a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法用來建立物件。The following example calls the method to create a object. 它會呼叫建構函式來具現化字串，包含十個項目，從字元陣列的第十四個位置開始。It calls the constructor to instantiate a string that contains ten elements from a character array starting at the fourteenth position. [!code-csharp[System.Activator.CreateInstance#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/cs/CreateInstance5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Activator.CreateInstance#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/vb/CreateInstance5.vb#5)] 下列範例會建立不規則的陣列，其項目是引數傳遞至建構函式。The following example creates a jagged array whose elements are arguments to be passed to a constructor. 範例接著會傳遞至每個陣列方法來叫用適當的字串建構函式。The example then passes each array to the method to invoke the appropriate string constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Activator.CreateInstance#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/cs/createinstance2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Activator.CreateInstance#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activator.createinstance/vb/createinstance2.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要叫用建構函式必須是可存取，而且必須提供指定的引數清單最特定的相符項目。The constructor to be invoked must be accessible and must provide the most specific match with the specified argument list. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用型別，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，以及包含非公用類型的組件的授權集是否限制為呼叫者的授與設定或其子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access nonpublic types if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types is restricted to the caller’s grant set or to a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

summary.span: 使用最符合指定參數的建構函式，建立指定類型的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the specified type using the constructor that best matches the specified parameters.

returns.span: 新建立物件的參考。

span.span: A reference to the newly created object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要叫用建構函式必須提供最符合指定繫結和繫結屬性的限制下指定的引數清單。The constructor to be invoked must provide the most specific match with the specified argument list under the constraints of the specified binder and binding attributes. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用類型和成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，以及包含非公用類型和成員的組件的授權集是否限制若要將呼叫者的授與集或子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access nonpublic types and members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types and members is restricted to the caller’s grant set or to a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

(請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編譯器會使用泛型的方法來實作型別參數所指定的型別具現化。The generic method is used by compilers to implement the instantiation of types specified by type parameters. 例如，在下列泛型方法的實作`new T()`(`gcnew T()` c + + 中) 會使用泛型方法。For example, in the following generic method, the implementation of `new T()` (`gcnew T()` in C++) uses the generic method. [!code-cpp[System.Activation.CreateInstance~~1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activation.createinstance~~1/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Activation.CreateInstance~~1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activation.createinstance~~1/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Activation.CreateInstance~~1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.activation.createinstance~~1/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 一般情況下，沒有任何適用於應用程式中的泛型方法程式碼，因為必須在編譯時期已知的型別。In general, there is no use for the generic method in application code, because the type must be known at compile time. 如果在編譯時期已知的類型，可以使用標準具現化語法 (`new`在 C# 中，運算子`New`Visual Basic 中`gcnew`c + + 中)。If the type is known at compile time, normal instantiation syntax can be used (`new` operator in C#, `New` in Visual Basic, `gcnew` in C++). 如果在編譯時期不知道類型，您可以呼叫的非泛型多載。If the type is not known at compile time, you can call a non-generic overload of . 沒有任何多載泛型方法接受引數清單，因為非泛型多載的已經提供晚期繫結的建構函式解析。There are no overloads of the generic method that take argument lists, because the non-generic overloads of already provide late-bound constructor resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來從 unmanaged 程式碼，存取 managed 的類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is used to access managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支援使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.
